title: Nihilism, dialogos, and the serious play of religion w/ Daniel Zaruba - Voices with Vervaeke
description:
Daniel and I participate in dialogos about dialogos and overcoming nihilism, while focusing on the work of the philosopher Nishitani and the serious play of religion. 

Daniel is teaching an 8-week masterclass on Nishitani Keiji’s seminal text “Religion & Nothingness” through Johannes Niederhauser’s Halkyon Academy. 

In the course you will learn how Nishitani attempted to overcome nihilism and the meaning crisis of our age through the Buddhist notion of emptiness.
You will also learn how the religio-philosophical traditions of East and West can be brought into mutual dialogue with each other.
Learn also about meditation and how to integrate it in both your daily life and your studies.

Group seminars will begin August 21st. You will get lifetime access to all course materials, as well as access to the Halkyon forum, where you can get in touch with your peers from the course and join the reading groups within the Halkyon forum.

You will find more information about the course and how to enroll via this link: https://halkyonacademy.teachable.com/p/nishitani-religion-and-nothingness/


For more information and more content you can also check out the Youtube channels of Daniel and Johannes:
Daniel’s channel: https://youtube.com/user/zappzapp00
Johannes’ channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDsQqlrzoc-K32DE-Wh-roA

This is part of my series Voices with Vervaeke: Science, Spirituality, and the Meaning Crisis. You can support my work on Patreon, with the proceeds going into the research I do at the University of Toronto on the Meaning Crisis and the cultivation of wisdom here: https://www.patreon.com/johnvervaeke 

Join the Discord Server to discuss and reflect upon my work: https://discord.gg/MXxRcmv
